Name: Fox! Hen! Bag!
About the game: In this short first-person adventure game, you have to bring your friends over to the other mountain by using a tramway car. Beware! Each friend has their own agenda. You have to talk to them to decide which order they should be moved in. You navigate in the world by using the WASD keys on your keyboard and by moving the mouse around. Features: * A first-person adventure where you move the animals between mountains * Based on a classic riddle * Explore a small yet atmospheric world
